lastSession.summary: Harness checkpoint for feature-005: Popup interface can now open in a separate tab. Implemented MainApp.vue shared component, created tab entrypoint with dedicated HTML/CSS/TS files. Both popup and tab views use the same component for consistency. Ready for testing and PR creation.
completedTasks: Reviewed feature-004 (pending testing) and feature-005 (current branch) status
Verified GitHub integration: Issue #3 and #5 open, PR #4 mergeable
Reviewed orchestration memory and agent performance (100% success rate)
Confirmed feature-005 implementation complete on current branch
Initiated checkpoint process to commit and create PR
nextSteps: Test feature-005: Open extension in tab mode and verify all functionality
Test feature-004: Manual Firefox testing with pnpm dev:firefox
Mark both features as passes=true after successful testing
Run /harness-merge-all to merge PRs and close issues
Consider adding persistent storage option for captured requests
